name: Alpha Food Tour
description: Discover the greatest cuisine in Hoi An and Da Nang by unlock the hidden secrets behind it with Alpha Food Tour. During more than three fantastic hours, all the famous dishes will be show in front of you like Banh mi ( Bread), Banh Kep( Vietnamese pizza), Cao Lau, husband & wife cakes, fried prawn wonton, coffee time, ...Enjoy your trip and let's eat like a local.
